Why Choose Acentro Services

For over thirty years, the ideal partner for simplifying your administrative practices

Our Strengths

Experience and Reliability

Active since 1986 and led by Nicola Testa, pioneer in electronic filing.

Territorial Coverage

With operational offices in Milan, Potenza, Rome, and Alcamo, we guarantee uniform service throughout the national territory.

Complete Range of Services

From traditional administrative practices to the most advanced digital services, we offer comprehensive support.

Digitalization and Innovation

At the forefront in using digital tools like Digital Signature, PEC, and Substitute Storage, integrated into a complete digital process.

Electronic Practice Management

We efficiently and precisely manage every type of electronic practice, such as financial statement deposits and lease contracts.

Personalized Support

We offer customized services for accountants, lawyers, and consultants, understanding their needs and work dynamics.

Our Commitment

Efficiency and Timeliness

We ensure immediate responses and quick solutions, thanks to a competent and constantly updated team.

Transparency and Clarity

We provide clear and detailed quotes, without surprises, and guarantee constant practice tracking.

Customized Solutions

We carefully analyze your needs to offer the most suitable solution, whether you want to completely delegate practice management or prefer support to operate independently.

Partnership and Trust

We consider service as participation and support, based on responsibility, quality, and respect for roles.

Distinctive Services

DIGIPRAM Software

We make DIGIPRAM available to our partners, designed to simplify and optimize administrative practice management.

Learn More

Advanced Digital Services

We facilitate SPID obtainment, offer electronic invoicing solutions, and ensure compliant document storage.

Learn More

Public Tender Support

We offer complete assistance for participation in public tenders and obtaining contributions.

Consular Visa Assistance

We support clients in requesting consular visas for business or tourism travel.

Register and List Registration

We facilitate registration with the National Environmental Managers Register and the Single National Register of the Third Sector (RUNTS).

Our priority is your peace of mind. We allow you to focus on your business while we handle your administrative practices.
